name: Bonelike DEMO
description:
This is just an alpha demo! Game in development... A Cheesy Adventure!

Join Carlangas, an immortal adventurer who has lost his wielding arm in an adventure to the mysterious Milkenary Cave, filled with dairy monsters and cheesy humour.

An Intense Roguelike!

Die over and over again in this roguelike while you try to get the Sacred Glass of Milk and defeat the evil Cheesus Christ!

How to play
